skills.name: New Destiny
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Innate:}} {{cis|Graves}} basic attacks consume up to {{as|2 shells|buzzword3}} before needing to reload. The reload speed is reduced based on his {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
Each attack fires several {{as|pellets|buzzword2}} in a cone that each collide with the first enemy hit. Hitting a target with multiple {{as|pellets|buzzword2}} will deal increased damage, and non-champion enemies are additionally {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}.
description: {{sbc|Innate - Double Barrel:}} '''Graves'''' [[basic attacks]] consume [[ammunition]] for {{as|2 shells|buzzword3}}. He will {{tt|reload|Graves is unable to declare basic attacks during this time.}} over a few seconds immediately after expending all shells or withholding leftover shells for a while. The reload time is reduced by '''Graves'''' level and {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, and can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.

{{sbc|Innate - 12-Gauge:}} '''Graves'''' basic attacks spray {{as|4 pellets|buzzword2}} in a cone, dealing {{as|{{pp|key=%|70 to 100}} AD}} {{as|physical damage}} plus{{ft|a third of the damage|{{as|{{pp|key=%|70/3 to 100/3}} AD}} damage}}for each subsequent {{as|pellet|buzzword2}}, up to a maximum of {{as|{{pp|key=%|70*2 to 100*2}} AD}} {{as|physical damage}}. Pellets deal 25% reduced damage against {{tip|turrets}}.
{{tip|Critical strikes}} spray {{as|6 pellets|buzzword2}} over a 50% wider cone, with each {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} dealing {{as|{{critical damage|30}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Buckshot:}} {{as|Pellets|buzzword2}} collide into the first enemy unit or structure they hit. Non-champion and Non-epic monsters units hit by more than one {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} are {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}. Each {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} applies [[on-hit effect]]s, but enemies are affected by them once per attack.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Double Barrel: Graves' basic attacks consume ammunition for 2 shells. He will reload over a few seconds immediately after expending all shells or withholding leftover shells for a while. The reload time is reduced by Graves' level and bonus attack speed, and can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.
Innate - 12-Gauge: Graves' basic attacks spray 4 pellets in a cone, dealing 70% − 100% (based on level) AD physical damage plusfor each subsequent pellet, up to a maximum of 70*2% − 100*2% (based on level) AD physical damage. Pellets deal 25% reduced damage against turrets.
Critical strikes spray 6 pellets over a 50% wider cone, with each pellet dealing (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage.
Innate - Buckshot: Pellets collide into the first enemy unit or structure they hit. Non-champion and Non-epic monsters units hit by more than one pellet are knocked back. Each pellet applies on-hit effects, but enemies are affected by them once per attack.
skills.notes:
* The in-game HUD displays '''Graves'''' reload speed in place of his attack speed. This is a visual bug, and his attack speed behaves normally.
* His reload speed is in the form of reloads per second:
** '''Graves'''' bonus attack speed [[growth]] and the cap affect his reload speed, making his {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} more worth after each level.
** Reload speed: Scales less the more attack speed you have until {{as|150% '''bonus''' attack speed}} (not included growth). Going over that will decrease the reload speed until capping at {{as|200% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
** The reload time after firing both '''shells''' and the time before the reloading starts while sitting on one shell are the same, of {{fd|2.08}} seconds. They're then reduced by {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}, to a minimum of {{pp|1.54;1.50;1.47;1.44;1.41;1.39;1.36;1.33;1.31;1.29;1.26;1.24;1.22;1.20;1.18;1.16;1.14;1.12|formula={{return}}• '''Time Cap''' = 1 / Reload Speed Cap. • '''Reload Speed Cap''' = 0.651 + ~0.014 per level, up to 0.891.}} seconds.
*** Reload speed at 150% bonus attack speed: {{pp|0.651; 0.665; 0.679; 0.694; 0.708; 0.722; 0.736; 0.750; 0.764; 0.778; 0.792; 0.806; 0.821; 0.835; 0.849; 0.863; 0.877; 0.891|round=false}}.
* The reload time with one '''shell''' is {{fd|1.3}} seconds.
* On-hit effects have a variety of interactions with '''New Destiny''':
** Charge based on-hit effects like {{nie|Energized}} or cooldown based on-hit effects like {{nie|Spellblade}} will apply to the first target ''hit'', and are not guaranteed to affect his attack target.
** [[Attack_effects#On_Attacking|On-Action Effects]] such as {{ai|Help, Pix!|Lulu}} and {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} will be triggered, and still obey their standard target-acquisition rules. {{nie|Wind's Fury}} can select secondary targets that are also damaged by '''Graves'''' attacks.
** {{ii|Black Cleaver}} will apply 1 stack to the enemy each individual ''pellet'' hits, stacking multiple times if multiple ''pellets'' hit the same target.
* {{iis|Randuin's Omen}} critical damage reduction will apply to every ''pellet''.
* Given the right circumstances ''pellets'' can go around and beyond the intended target thus damaging other enemies.
** If '''Graves''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} ''pellets'' will fly (still in a cone) in a random direction (excluding his target's) but he can still damage nearby enemy units hit by pellets.
* Structures will intercept and be hit by multiple ''pellets'', as with other valid targets.
** Units that take modified damage ({{ii|Warding Totem|wards}}) can only be damaged by one ''pellet'' per attack and will not intercept additional ones.
* '''Graves'''' {{tip|attack windup}} is based on such a low value that it will always take only {{tt|1 game tick|1/30th of a second}}, even at the lowest possible {{sti|{{as|attack speed}}}} (''0.2AS'').

skills.name: End of the Line
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Graves}} fires an explosive shell that deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies it passes through.
The shell leaves a powder trail as it travels, and will detonate the trail after a short time, or immediately if it hits [[terrain]]. The explosion deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies within.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Graves''' fires a round in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies it passes through and leaves behind a powder trail.

After 2 seconds or after {{fd|0.25}} seconds upon colliding with terrain, the round detonates, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within a wide perpendicular area and in a reverse wave along the powder trail.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Graves fires a round in the target direction that deals physical damage to all enemies it passes through and leaves behind a powder trail.
After 2 seconds or after 0.25 seconds upon colliding with terrain, the round detonates, dealing physical damage to all enemies within a wide perpendicular area and in a reverse wave along the powder trail.
leveling: {{st|Detonation Damage|{{ap|85 to 225}} {{as|(+ {{ap|40 to 160}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|45+85 to 105+225}} {{as|(+ {{ap|80+40 to 80+160}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} can only block one instance of the ability's damage.
* {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} will destroy the projectile entirely and mitigate all effects, including the trail on the ground. 
* {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} is considered to be terrain for the purposes of the projectile, triggering its second effect.
* ''End of the Line'' will cast from wherever '''Graves''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str: • Initial Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)

• Detonation Damage: (+ % bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

skills.name: Smoke Screen
skills.custominfo: {{tt|250|Estimated, reduces sight radius to this number}}
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Graves}} fires a smoke canister at the target location that creates a cloud of smoke upon impact, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} nearby enemies.
Enemies within the lingering cloud are {{tip|nearsight|nearsighted}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Graves''' fires a smoke canister at the target location that, upon impact, deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 50% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

The canister creates a cloud of smoke for 4 seconds that applies {{tip|nearsight}} of outside the area to all enemies within every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, reducing their {{tip|sight}} radius relative to the center.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target location that, upon impact, deals magic damage to enemies within the area and slows them by 50% for 0.5 seconds.
The canister creates a cloud of smoke for 4 seconds that applies nearsight of outside the area to all enemies within every 0.25 seconds, reducing their sight radius relative to the center.
skills.notes:
* ''Smoke Screen'' will nearsight {{tip|untargetable}} units.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block the instance of damage and {{tip|slow}}, but will not mitigate the persistent area of effect.
* {{tip|cc-immune|Crowd control immunity}} and {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} have no effect on the user's {{tip|sight}} radius reduction despite the {{tip|nearsight}} being resisted / removed. Loss of allied vision will still be affected.
** Removing or resisting the nearsight will prevent it from being reapplied while staying inside the area (leaving and coming back inside will not).
* The nearsight debuff applies to non-champions but it does not inherently stop them from performing actions that require {{tip|sight}}, such as [[basic attack]]ing.

skills.name: Quickdraw
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Graves}} {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the target direction and reloads {{as|1 shell|buzzword3}}. He also gains a stack of ''True Grit'', doubled if he dashed toward an enemy {{tip|champion}}.
Each time he hits an enemy with a {{as|pellet|buzzword2}}, the cooldown is {{sti|ah|reduced}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Graves''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location, {{tip|basic attack reset|resetting}} his basic attack timer and reloading one {{as|shell|buzzword3}} while gaining a [[stack]] of ''True Grit'' for 4 seconds, stacking up to 8 times. Dashing towards an enemy grants 2 stacks of ''True Grit''.
''Quickdraw's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by {{fd|0.5}} seconds for every {{as|pellet|buzzword2}} impacting an enemy.
{{sbc|True Grit:}} '''Graves''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}}. Subsequent casts of ''Quickdraw'' and attacks versus non-minions will refresh the duration of ''True Grit''.
If '''Graves''' dashes while reloading, he can cast his other abilities during the dash.{{bug|1}}
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Graves dashes to the target location, resetting his basic attack timer and reloading one shell while gaining a stack of True Grit for 4 seconds, stacking up to 8 times. Dashing towards an enemy grants 2 stacks of True Grit.
Quickdraw's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds for every pellet impacting an enemy.
True Grit: Graves gains bonus armor. Subsequent casts of Quickdraw and attacks versus non-minions will refresh the duration of True Grit.
If Graves dashes while reloading, he can cast his other abilities during the dash.Unknown value: bug / 1

effects.str:
• Bonus Armor:
  • Maximum Armor:

skills.name: Collateral Damage
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Graves}} {{tip|dash|recoils}} backward and fires an explosive shell in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies it passes through.
Upon hitting an enemy champion or max range, the shell explodes to deal {{as|physical damage}} in a cone.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Graves''' fires an explosive shell in the target direction which deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit while also {{tip|dash|recoiling}} in the opposite direction.
After hitting an enemy champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes to deal 80% of its original damage in a cone. The same unit cannot be damaged by both the shell and the explosion.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Graves fires an explosive shell in the target direction which deals physical damage to all enemies hit while also recoiling in the opposite direction.
After hitting an enemy champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes to deal 80% of its original damage in a cone. The same unit cannot be damaged by both the shell and the explosion.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|250 to 550}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Explosion Physical Damage|{{ap|250*0.8 to 550*0.8}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the target hit by the shell and {{tip|area damage}} to targets within the explosion.
* The projectile will still explode early if the champion hit by the shell is protected by a {{tip|spell shield}}.
* ''Collateral Damage'' is disabled while {{tip|ground|grounded}} but not while {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* ''Collateral Damage'' will cast from wherever '''Graves''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 150% bonus AD)
  • Explosion Physical Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)
